utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pheebs? Could you get that? Please?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why? Just 'cause you're too lazy to get up off your touchie?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! No! It's just that all the people in the entire world that I want to talk to are right here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sucker!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hello? Hey Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs! Listen, uh can you do me a favor? I forgot the pin number to my ATM card can, can you get it for me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure! Where is it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, I scratched it on the ATM machine down on the corner.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh! So you're 5639?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's it! Thanks Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, do you want to talk to Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is that Joey?! Let me talk to him!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! Because he didn't believe in my movie! Which is a big mistake because it is real! Real!

utterance.speaker: A Casino Boss
utterance.content: Hey! Tribbiani! Get back to work! Break time's over!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Who was that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, my stunt double. Yeah, and y'know, he's getting a little too familiar for my tastes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know what? I have been trying to apologize to him all week! If he's not gonna let me do it on the phone, I'm gonna go down there and do it in person.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh Pheebs, I heard that. Can you put him on?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't come out here!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no-no-no, I've supported you one hundred percent and I want to prove that to you in person!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I got that! I forgive ya! Don't come out here!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Forgive me? You haven't been taking my calls in a week!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I'm totally over it Chandler. Friends forever! Don't come out here!

utterance.speaker: A Tourist
utterance.content: Would you mind doing a picture with us?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, what was that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica! I'm sorry I'm late! Monica?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe? Oh, Phoebe, I'm so sorry. Have you been here long?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's okay. What the hell took you so long?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, you can not tell Chandler. Okay? That I ran into Richard.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Which Richard?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The Richard.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Richard Simmons?! Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Noo! My ex-boyfriend Richard! Y'know the tall guy, moustache?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Okay, that actually makes more sense. So how was it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It was, it was really nice. We started talking and I-I ended up having lunch with him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That is so weird! I had a dream that you'd have lunch with Richard.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But again, Simmons. Go on.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The strange part was, he was really nice, umm and he looks great, but I didn't feel anything at all!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh! So now why can't we tell Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because it would totally freak him out and tomorrow's our anniversary. I just don't want anything to spoil that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I can't believe you guys lasted a whole year!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow! I owe Rachel 20 bucks!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: On a totally different bet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's almost our anniversary!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know. Can you believe it? One year ago today I was just your annoying friend Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Awww! Now you're just my annoying friend Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Huh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I got you a present!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, but it's not 'til tomorrow!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know, but you have to open it today!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay! There you go! It's two tickets to Vegas!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: For this weekend! Oh gosh, it would be perfect, we get to see Joey plus we get to start our anniversary celebration on the plane. We can call it out plane-aversary.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do we have to?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay this is great, but Joey said he didn't want any of us out there.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, he just doesn't want us to go through any trouble. Think of how excited he'll be when we go out and surprise him! Plus we get to have our own, ani-Vegas-ary! A-Nevadaversary!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I think we should see other people.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But we can go, right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's a great idea.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, I'm gonna go too!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know Pheebs, it's kinda our anniversary.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh please, you are not gonna ditch again like you did with London.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ditch you? Phoebe, you were pregnant with the triplets!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh, great story! I'm going!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, you guys, listen, this weekend we're all gonna go to Las Vegas to surprise Joey! Including me!! You wanna go?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I guess I could take a couple days off work.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Of course you can take a couple days off work because this trip includes me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, wait a minute, wait, I've got a presentation tomorrow. I can't miss that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, but I've got tickets to the Van Gogh exhibit! I've been waiting like a year for this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Art lover!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What'd you say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I said art lover.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is that supposed to be an insult?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know, I'm very tired.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So Rach, maybe you and I could fly out together Saturday.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That sounds great.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah? All right I'll call the airlines.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Yeah, that would be nice actually, to have the apartment to myself for a night.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah, so you can walk around naked.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! So I can be by myself. Y'know? Have a little alone time.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Naked alone time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Phoebe just because I'm alone doesn’t mean I wanna walk around naked. I mean, you live alone, you don't walk around naked.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh! Why do you think it takes me so long to answer the door?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So, so far is this trip to Vegas better or worse than the trip to London?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So it's pretty much the same Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, what about after I give you these candies?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess it's a little better now.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ah-ha! Okay, Las Vegas 1, London 0! I'll be right back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Happy plane-aversary.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Aww! I love you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Can I give you a present now?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay! Oh man! Don’t tell me I did this!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I love the "I forgot the present" fake out!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How do you feel about the, "I really did forgot the present, please forgive me" not fake out?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that's okay. Don’t worry about it, you can give it to me when we get back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ohh that's the worse thing that can happen on an anniversary ever!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh good! All right, so you decided to tell him about the Richard thing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What-what Richard thing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What Richard thing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Simmons! Go with Simmons!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I umm, I ran into Richard yesterday and he asked me if I wanted to go for a bite and I did. The only reason I didn't tell you is because I knew you'd get mad and I didn't want to spoil our anniversary.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm not mad.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah! Yeah, so you-you bumped into Richard! You grabbed a bite! It's no big deal.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, London 1…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Look what happened! {Don't get your hopes up guys, we only get to see her from the back or from the neck up. Its times like these I wish that the networks would broadcast some nudity other than Denis Franz's butt.} Huh, check me out! I'm in my kitchen…naked! I'm picking up an orange. I'm naked! Lighting the candles, naked, and carefully.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! That's Rachel naked! I can't look at that! I am looking at this. Okay, vivid colors, expressive brush strokes—Unless she wants me to be looking at that. She knows I'm home. She knows I can see her. What kind of game is she playing? I think maybe someone's lonely tonight. Oh-ho, Dr. Geller! Stop it! You're being silly! Or, am I?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Love to love ya baby! Ow! Love to love ya baby! Ow! Love to love ya, baby! Darnit! Ugh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.
